findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner by setting the `_maxTxAmount` to zero.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to manipulate fees by setting `_maxTxAmount` to zero or increasing tax fee percentage above 25%. This can lead to unauthorized transactions and fee manipulation.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code elimination is necessary to remove unnecessary code and optimize contract performance.

findings.title: Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.
